comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Marie Tailer, "one of society's prettiest girls" according to the NY Times headline(!), daughter of Mr. and Mrs. J. Lee Tailer, married Stuart Bryce Wing, son of Mr. and Mrs. L. Stuart Wing, in November 1915. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F30D17F8385B17738... She divorced Mr. Wing in Reno in 1930, on the grounds of mental cruelty; soon after, she married Harry Granger Gaither, in Baltimore. She died in 1954. An image of her mother, Marie Sterling Tailer (1870-1943): www.nyhistory.org/node/45942

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for the research on Marie Tailer.  We will add some of the information to the description when we update the database.
